detaileddescription.para: All URIs are relative to http://localhost

Method | HTTP request | Description ---------- | ---------- | ---------- add_graph_parts | POST /api/sessions/{sessionId}/graph/append | cancel_session | POST /api/sessions/{sessionId}/cancel | create_session | POST /api/sessions | deploy_session | POST /api/sessions/{sessionId}/deploy | destroy_session | DELETE /api/sessions/{sessionId} | get_graph | GET /api/sessions/{sessionId}/graph | get_graph_size | GET /api/sessions/{sessionId}/graph/size | get_graph_status | GET /api/sessions/{sessionId}/graph/status | get_nm_status | GET /api | Your GET endpoint get_session_information | GET /api/sessions/{sessionId} | get_session_status | GET /api/sessions/{sessionId}/status | get_sessions | GET /api/sessions | stop_manager | POST /api/stop |
